resource.name: Crime Incidents
resource.description: This is a dataset of crime incidents in the City of Buffalo. This dataset is updated daily and offers a preliminary look at crime reports in the City of Buffalo. See disclaimer in metadata below for further information.
columns_description: The geographic identifier assigned to the 2020 census block where the crime incident was located
The 2010 census tract associated with the crime incident.
The time the crime incident was created.
A description of the crime incident
The neighborhood of the crime incident
The 2010 census block associated with the crime incident.
The address of the crime incident.
The date and time of the crime incident.
The census tract of the crime incident.
The geographic identifier assigned to the 2020 census tract where the crime incident was located
The 2010 census block group associated with the crime incident.
The hour of the day associated with the crime incident.
The parent type of the crime incident.
The geographic identifier assigned to the 2020 census block group where the crime incident was located
The census block of the crime incident.
The six-digit 2020 census tract of the crime incident.
The unique identifier of the crime incident.
The council district associated with the crime incident.
The longitude associated with the crime incident
The geographic location associated with the crime incident
The state where the crime incident was reported
The primary crime type of the incident.
The census block group of the crime incident.
The latitude associated with the crime incident
The case number for each crime incident.
The police district associated with the crime incident.
The city where the crime incident was reported.
The day of the week associated with the crime incident.

domain_metadata.value: Buffalo police are investigating reports of the crimes listed which were reported in the past. It is important to note that this is very preliminary information and further investigation as to the facts and circumstances of such reports may be necessary. Note: The data become unreliable before January 2009 and do not provide a complete picture of incidents responded to by the Buffalo Police Department.

resource.name: Annual Average Daily Traffic Volume Counts
resource.description:
Traffic count data are provided as a public service by GBNRTC’s and member agencies.Traffic volumes are collected by manual and mechanical means and are hosted at anindependent site. They represent typical volumes likely to be found at a location. Countsare reviewed for accuracy but are subject to inaccuracies inherent in the collectionmethod and variability of traffic flows. Traffic data collected prior to and including 2012were uploaded in bulk, and may be subject to data transfer and processing errors.

Please be aware that errors may still exist even though reasonable efforts were made to identify and correct any errors.The data available is posted for informational purposes only. GBNRTC assumes no responsibility or any liability whatsoever, which may develop by users' review and use of this data. This data is periodically updated. Users are responsible to be aware of any updates and incorporate the updated data as may be appropriate for their work.
resource.attribution: Greater Buffalo Niagara Regional Transportation Council
columns_description: Annual Average Daily Traffic - Trucks Only
County in which the location is located
For locations, direction from intersecting road
Year for Annual Average Daily Traffic computation
The description of the endof the segment of roadway for which the AADT applies
Direction of traffic flow
Annual Average Daily Traffic - Automobiles Only

Annual Average Daily Traffic volume value: on any given day the average numbers of vehicles that pass the segment of roadway as described by the On/From/To/Approach descriptions. These figures are based on an actual count taken for that year or statistically validated estimated and forecasted values
Name of the roadway the AADT was calculated for
Name of the municipality in which the AADT was calculated
The geographic location where the AADT was calculated
Identification code for the location where the count is taken
The description of the start of the segment of roadway for which the AADT applies

resource.name: Planning, Zoning, and Historic Preservation Approvals
resource.description:
The Division of Planning and Zoning supports and advises the following three regulatory boards: Planning Board, Zoning Board of Appeals, and Historic Preservation Board.

This dataset contains approvals made by the three regulatory boards and Division of Planning staff.

The Planning Board makes determinations on Major Site Plans and Subdivisions. The planning staff makes determinations on Minor Site Plans.

The Preservation Board reviews all exterior changes to landmark properties and properties located within City of Buffalo Preservation Districts as per Chapter 337 of City of Buffalo Code.

The Zoning Board of Appeals reviews all applications seeking relief from what is required by the Unified Development Ordinance.

Applications that are denied are not shown in this dataset. For conditions of approval, please see the minutes of each board: http://buffalony.iqm2.com/Citizens/Calendar.aspx
columns_description: Unique identifier
The neighborhood of the location of the review
The datetime of the result
The zip code of the location of the review
Unique identifier
The street name of the location of the review
The state of the location of the review

The type of review appraised by the board { MAJORSITE = Major Site Approvals, MINORSITE = Minor Site Approvals,CITY-WIDE = Citywide Site Plan, LANDMARK = Landmark Property, PRES = Preservation District, ZONING = Zoning Board of Appeals }
The address number of the location of the review
Unique identifier
Unique identifier
The type of application of the review
The census block of the location of the review

The census tract of the location of the review
The city of the location of the review
The council district of the location of the review
The latitude of the location of the review
The geolocation of the review
The longitude of the location of the review
The result of the review {APPROVED =  Approved, AppCond = Conditional Approval (see comments)}
The parcel id of the location of the review
The police district of the location of the review
The address of the location of the review

resource.name: BPD Stations
resource.description: This is a dataset of Buffalo Police Department stations in the City of Buffalo. There is a station in each of the five police districts as well as a station for the Traffic unit.

resource.name: Parking Summonses
